name: Sprint 8: LangGraph Orchestration Engine
description: Add LangGraph StateGraph to Legion sprint executor. Replace ad-hoc task sequencing with state machine. Add checkpoint persistence for crash recovery. Integrate LangChain tools for Claude CLI, git ops, test runners.

name: Sprint 8: LangGraph Orchestration Engine
description: Add LangGraph StateGraph to Legion sprint executor

name: Sprint 8: LangGraph Orchestration Engine for Sprint Execution
description: Add LangGraph StateGraph to Legion's autonomous sprint executor. Replace ad-hoc task sequencing with a proper state machine: PLAN -> EXECUTE -> TEST -> FIX -> COMMIT -> LEARN. Add checkpoint persistence so crashed sprints resume from last checkpoint. Integrate LangChain tool nodes for Claude CLI execution, git operations, and test runners.

name: Sprint 4: Async I/O Performance Fix
description: CRITICAL: Fix event loop blocking in project_learning_service.py. Replace 6 synchronous Path.read_text() calls with aiofiles async reading. Replace json.loads(file.read_text()) with async JSON loading. Fix directory scanning to use async iteration.

name: Sprint 9: Smart Email & Calendar Management
description: Complete Gmail sync with History API, implement AI email classification using Ollama, build alert system with VIP senders/quiet hours, finish calendar conflict detection and free slot calculation, wire up gmail-check/gmail-digest workflows.

name: Sprint 1: Test Infrastructure & Coverage Expansion
description: Fix broken test infrastructure (64 of 95 tests failing due to fixture scope issues) and achieve 70%+ test coverage. Only 2 of 22 services have tests. Frontend has only 1 example test file.

name: Sprint 1: Telegram Cleanup & Broken Imports Recovery
description: Fix all broken imports and references left behind after the massive Telegram code removal (185k+ lines). 4 scripts have broken TelegramNotifier imports, SQL migrations still reference telegram channels, and 28+ files have stale telegram references.

name: Sprint 0: Product Documentation
description:
Created from template: Sprint 0: Product Documentation

Generate comprehensive product documentation including features, API reference, and roadmap

name: Sprint 5: Sprint Sync Service (Phase 2)
description: Implement sprint sync from ADA and FortressOS PostgreSQL databases into Legion. Create sprint_sync_service.py, add source_system/source_id columns, build sync API endpoints, add scheduled sync every 4 hours, handle graceful degradation when source DBs unavailable.

name: Sprint 10: Workflow Orchestration Engine
description: Build execution engine for existing YAML workflows (gmail-check, gmail-digest, daily-briefing). Implement WorkflowParser, DAGExecutor with topological sort, StateManager for crash recovery, StepHandlers for skill/llm/http/notify/condition steps.

name: Sprint 2: LangGraph Workflow Frontend Integration
description: Complete Sprint 11 tasks: connect LangGraphWorkflowPanel to real SSE endpoint (currently shows mock data), integrate AgentHealthService with OllamaService metrics, add retry logic with exponential backoff.

name: Sprint 2: LangGraph Checkpointing Migration
description: Replace in-memory MemorySaver with PostgreSQL-backed AsyncPostgresSaver for LangGraph workflows. Currently 7 locations have checkpointing disabled. HITL approval storage is in-memory only, losing state on restart.

name: Sprint 6: Sprint Execution Completeness
description: Fill TODO gaps in autonomous executor: complete sprint learning persistence (sprint_learnings table), implement checkpoint save/restore, connect autonomous development endpoint to executor, add execution telemetry (duration, resource usage, model costs).

name: Sprint 11: Enhanced Legion Integration & Proactive Intelligence
description: Wire enhancement scanner to auto-create Legion tasks, implement email-to-Legion-task conversion, build meeting-to-task flow, add blocked task escalation via Discord, create cross-project intelligence and smart task suggestions.

name: Sprint 3: Gmail Integration & OAuth Security
description: Complete Gmail OAuth flow with token storage, refresh, encryption. Add email pagination, AI classification for job-related emails, interview detection, and application status auto-updates.

name: Sprint 3: Discord Bot Integration Completion
description: Complete Discord bot integration to replace Telegram. Bot service exists but is not started in main.py, EventConsumer not connected to alert pipeline, duplicate implementations exist, and no health check for bot connection.

name: Sprint 7: Service Health Monitoring & Observability
description: Add health check endpoints to all core services (60+ services). Create /api/health/services endpoint, add service dependency graph, implement connection pool monitoring, add Prometheus metrics, create health dashboard in frontend.
